title: Diary of a Charged Creeper
description: This Minecraft Story Is Over 9,000 Words Long with Pictures to Accompany the Story.  Read this Minecraft book FREE as part of your Amazon Prime or Kindle Unlimited membership  Meet Charlie the Creeper, he is like any other regular Creeper, except he has a dream. He wants to be a somebody, and the only way to do that is to do go something amazing. Read this Minecraft story today to learn about how Charlie decides to become a Charged Creeper.  Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.
